nodes.text: A city existed somewhere in the galaxy that was home to a Podracing course. The Podracer pilots Wan Sandage Jr., Kraid Nemmeso, and Aldar Beedo raced on it during 24 BBY. Nemmeso and Beedo were caught in a collision with each other on the course while trying to down Sandage's Podracer.
This planet first appeared in the 2002 video game Star Wars: Racer Revenge. The course and planet only appear in the game's opening cutscene, and does not appear anywhere else in the game.
